sentence: Also, Trump's efforts to shape Georgia's race for governor has not been going according to plan as his candidate for the Republican primary, former Sen. David Perdue, is trailing incumbent Brian Kemp in at least one recent poll.
author: Editors
title: Ukraine evacuations, Trump rally, weekend at the Masters: 5 things to know this weekend
